title: Ocean oddities
creator_credit: Efftee Film Productions, Australian Educational Films and Noel Monkman
brief_description: The coral structure of the Great Barrier Reef provides protection for a number of creatures such as the stone-fish, the giant mantis shrimp,the crown of thorns seastar, the black beche-de-mer and the green turtle.
